title: Question:
author: robelneo
content: This fight is for the vacant IBF Middleweight title both fighters are undefeated but relatively not popular in the boxing community, but because this is a higher-level weight category whoever wins in this fight will become popular and may challenge those popular names and champions like Canelo This fight is a week away hopefully we can broadcast it here on a free live feed because when two undefeated boxers fight in the heavier category expect a lot of action and possible knockouts.I have Falcao winning by knockout because he is the one with the power having accumulated a 63% knockout ratio and Gualtieri never fought outside Germany.So who have you got in this fight?Esquiva Falcao vs Vincenzo Gualtieri vacant title fight set for July 1st in GermanyEsquiva Falcao boxing highlightsVincenzo Gualtieri boxing highlightImages from: box.live

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Both fighters are not that popular and they are not top-level fighters anyone of them can be beaten by Jermell Charlo, but between the two Falcao is a better fighter as you can see from the highlight of the fight he has an unorthodox style of fighting, punch hard and successive but since the fight is going to be held in Germany, Gualteri's hometown, Gualteri has a homecourt and it could work to his advantage.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on June 24, 2023, 11:37:51 PMI have Falcao winning by knockout because he is the one with the power having accumulated a 63% knockout ratio and Gualtieri never fought outside Germany.So who have you got in this fight?If I am not mistaken and look at Gualtieri, he has never gone out in a fight so far, he only bets on his country/city/Germany, after all recently Gualtieri has only won on points, as happened yesterday with Bevilacqua, it happened not just one time, almost five matches with different opponents in the ring.What else have I seen in one of the sources about the two of them Gualtieri Vs Falcao for this match.QuoteFalcao and Gualtieri are each eligible for USD205,000, a 50/50 split as the two highest ranked challengers.I doubt the fight for both, i will not waste my money and time on betting, even though this fight is dubbed as IBF title fight, my judgment is not going to happen, we will see continuation of IBF title in future.I understand the fist fight between Gualtieri Vs Falcao will end (a technical decision).

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: This fight will be one of those hard to predict since their records are both clean, and they will going to face each other in their prime. This fight will gonna get exciting since they won't be going to give up each other clean records easily. This kind of fight is what makes boxing interesting because from now on, they gonna need to work harder because whoever wins will face a more strong opponent and will gonna have more storm facing against him, and when he beats all of them, he will gonna be one of the legendary boxers.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Between the two Falcao is the better boxer but expects Gualtieri to be fired up because he is fighting in front of his countryman and this is where he gets all his win if the fight is close Gualtieri will get the win, so Falcao is pressured to win by knock out or dominate Gualtieri.If Gualtieri wins the match he should fight outside of Germany because the IBF will not just let their title confine in one country, IBF will not sanction this fight if both fighters are patsy, they can hold on their own.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Seeing theres not much boxing matches these days, I will still try my luck on this. Falcao it is.67% KO rate isn't so high to bet for Win By KO though. Gualteri is younger and looks tough too, I will also go for win by decision.Falcao's face doesn't look like he can snap fast actually lol But its said southpaws always have the advantage.

Initial odds are released on my favorites bookies but it's only the ML for now and the homeboy is the huge underdog in this match.What's interesting that i saw on the tale of the tape is that the "pro-boxing rounds" is almost even despite the disparity of their matches, i mean there's a 10 fight gap between the two, that's because Falcao got more knockouts but the thing is those boxing rounds might play a role and a factor that might work on Gualtieri advantage. For now, i will be waiting for more betting options as "Gualtieri by decision" might be juicy.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: bisdak40 on June 29, 2023, 10:49:41 AM For now, i will be waiting for more betting options as "Gualtieri by decision" might be juicy.Gualtieri is not a knockout artist and Falcao will not show respect if Gualtieri does not have the power to hurt him, this is one occasion where one boxer is not popular in the boxing world that's because Gualtieri never fought outside of Germany if he ever wins it he'll have to travel in the boxing capitals like Las Vegas and fought the best in that division, I don't argue with IBF decision to get an unknown fighter for World crowns but this is the heavier division and fighters in that weight category should earn their rights to fight in the world title, like fighting in the US first for elimination.Anyway, Falcao needs to knock out or totally dominate Gualtieri as the hometown decision will play here if ti lasts 12 rounds.

comments.author: Viscore
comments.body: I haven't heard of these names, and I'm glad I found out about this event late since the fight is already over. I could have bet on Esquiva Falcao because he has a better record, but unfortunately, he lost via unanimous decision. From what I've seen, it seems tough for him. As for the current champion, I don't think he will last on his throne.
